about_the_game:
About this game:
(check update 1.1.5 Fixed missing executable)
This is IndieFist's new casual/endless game based on back rooms and anomalies.



In Nine Floors, you are a student who is done with the horror of high school classes. Get down and go home! Your friend is waiting for you.

Avoid your classmates, you don't want any trouble, that evil janitor... he sure won't let you go home....
Scary, go down the nine floors, and if you find anything strange... Turn around and go back the way you came.
Pay attention, any detail can be something strange on your way, only the first hallway is the right hallway, don't be afraid and escape from the horror of the institute!



Gameplay.



The first round and every time you miss a mistake, you will be in Hallway Floor 9.
So you have to pay attention and memorize everything. Go to the end of the Hallway and go down.
Now you are on Floor 8. Check along the Hallway if there is anything different from Floor 9, if not go down to the end of the Hallway, as soon as you find any difference or anomaly go back and go down to the beginning of this Hallway.
Reach Floor 9 and meet your friend.

Features:


- 16 common anomalies
- 9 specia/rare or epic jumpscare
- aesthetic graphics
- intense gameplay
- smooth movement
- special run against timer
- new game mode after complete normal mode

*** notice
If you want to post videos of our game:
All individuals and companies can record and distribute videos without permission, but please check and comply with the following recommendations.
・Please include the name of the game in the title of the video.
・We are not responsible for any damages for the release of videos of this game.
・The contents of these rules are subject to change without notice.

content_descriptors.notes:
Inside the game the atmosphere can be a bit sinister, from time to time there are random scares, a bird hits a glass, a thunder and everything becomes dark and night. An object falls to the ground and suddenly....
 There is no violence against people or animals.

(check update 1.1.5 Fixed missing executable)

Pay attention, any detail can be something strange on your way, only the first hallway is the right hallway, don't be afraid and escape from the horror of the institute!

So you have to pay attention and memorize everything. Go to the end of the Hallway and go down.
Now you are on Floor 8. Check along the Hallway if there is anything different from Floor 9, if not go down to the end of the Hallway, as soon as you find any difference or anomaly go back and go down to the beginning of this Hallway.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 and above
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 and above
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

name: Nine Floors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX™ 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700K
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX™ 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space

oflc.descriptors:
Mild Themes
Scary Scenes
Online Interactivity

short_description: In Nine Floors, you are a student who has finished the horror of high school classes. Move down and go home! The High school feel like a backroom, find the anomaly in each floor and reach the exit. Based on popular's game The Exit 8 and Shinkansen 0 | 新幹線 0号
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Dutch
*languages with full audio support
